articles.title: Even the tax expert who won big betting against DOGE on Kalshi is still figuring out how to file his taxes
articles.summary: A tax professional made a profitable bet against the Department of Government Efficiency on Kalshi but now faces the ironic challenge of properly reporting his prediction market winnings. The situation highlights how even tax experts are grappling with the murky regulations around prediction market profits, signaling that clearer IRS guidance can't come soon enough for the growing number of Americans betting on political outcomes.

articles.title: Bitcoin Needs a Huge Rally to Hit $150,000 by December -- Are Polymarket's 12% Odds Too Low, Too High, or Just About Right?
articles.summary: Polymarket traders are giving Bitcoin just 12% odds of hitting $150,000 by year-end, despite the crypto's recent momentum and growing institutional adoption. The wide gap between bullish crypto predictions and actual betting odds creates a classic arbitrage opportunity for traders who think the market is either wildly overconfident or dangerously complacent.

articles.title: From Water Breaks to Handshakes: How Prediction Markets Monetize the Mundane
articles.summary: Prediction markets now let you bet on everything from when politicians will take bathroom breaks to whether world leaders will actually shake hands at summits. These hyper-specific micro-markets are creating new revenue streams for platforms while giving sharp bettors arbitrage opportunities in events most people ignore.

articles.title: Are Prediction Markets Mirroring Crypto's Boom?
articles.summary: Prediction markets are experiencing explosive growth patterns eerily similar to crypto's early days, with surging volumes, mainstream attention, and institutional money flooding in. This parallel suggests we're either witnessing the birth of a massive new asset class or heading for a spectacular crash that could set the industry back years.

articles.title: Coinbase’s head of litigation says states are “gaslighting” on prediction markets
articles.summary: Coinbase's top lawyer is accusing state regulators of misleading the public about prediction markets, likely in response to ongoing legal battles over platforms like Kalshi and PredictIt. This signals that major crypto players are ready to fight state-level crackdowns, which could either accelerate nationwide legalization or trigger a messy patchwork of conflicting regulations.

articles.title: OpenAI Fires an Employee for Prediction Market Insider Trading
articles.summary: OpenAI terminated an employee who allegedly used inside information to trade on prediction markets, marking the first major insider trading scandal to hit the AI industry's betting ecosystem. This sets a precedent that could trigger stricter compliance measures across tech companies and force prediction market platforms to implement more sophisticated monitoring for employees at AI firms with tradeable outcomes.

articles.title: Prediction Markets for Gas Prices in the US This Month
articles.summary: Gas price prediction markets are gaining traction as traders bet on whether pump prices will spike or slide before month-end. Smart money knows energy markets move fast, and getting ahead of consumer sentiment shifts could pay off big if you can nail the timing on inflation fears or relief rallies.

articles.title: The Prediction Market Debate Is Older Than You Think
articles.summary: Prediction markets aren't some Silicon Valley invention from the 2000s,economists and statisticians have been debating their merits and flaws for decades, if not centuries. Understanding this long history of skepticism and support helps explain why regulators still treat prediction markets like radioactive waste, despite mounting evidence of their forecasting power.

articles.title: Kalshi and Polymarket Are Economic Oracles
articles.summary: Prediction markets like Kalshi and Polymarket have evolved beyond entertainment betting into sophisticated economic forecasting tools that reveal real-time sentiment about everything from elections to inflation. Smart money is already using these platforms as leading indicators, making them essential reading for anyone trying to predict where markets and politics are heading next.

articles.title: Polymarket bettors appear to have insider-traded on a market designed to catch insider traders
articles.summary: Polymarket users allegedly used non-public information to profit on a market that was specifically created to detect and expose insider trading activity. The incident highlights how prediction markets struggle to police themselves and raises questions about whether platforms can effectively prevent the very behavior they're designed to catch.

articles.title: Kalshi bets on Neal Katyal in prediction market cases
articles.summary: Kalshi has hired former U.S. Solicitor General Neal Katyal to represent them in their ongoing legal battles over which prediction markets they can operate. This signals Kalshi is preparing for major Supreme Court-level fights that could determine whether prediction markets become mainstream or remain heavily restricted.

articles.title: Who will win Survivor 50? Predictions, odds after Survivor premiere
articles.summary: Survivor 50 just premiered and prediction markets are already pricing contestants' chances of taking home the $1 million prize. Reality TV betting has exploded into a legitimate market where social media sleuthing and gameplay analysis can give sharp bettors real edges over casual fans.
